1.content:
My name is Markus, am a in my last year at school.
One day I am so bored as in most of my times, but especially on the evenings and weekends it becomes obvious that I have no real friends. Not to speak about a girlfriend…I don’t know why. It is not that I look ugly or am fat or something, also I not dirty, actually according to my mom I am handsome and good looking, but of course this is my mom telling this….
I had some best friend, Toby, but since he has a girlfriend, thinks have pretty much changed, for the better for him of course, but not for me. Actually, to be honest with myself I was lonely…
So as usual on Friday evenings, while other folks were out in town or on parties, I was spending some time on my computer watching some more or less nice YouTube videos, surfing around….
I wanted to end my day and go to bed and close my computer: One last check of my emails. I found some strange messages of being selected to some beta testing for some app/ webservice that I even don’t remember signing up or applying for. Anyhow out of curiosity I checked the given link from the email to see what this all about:
1.title: start

12.content: It was an app that about changes. All I need to do was put in a name of a person, give their picture, and I can change them in any way. I though it was a scam, but I figured why not, and decide to test it out on someone.
12.title: what I find is interesting

122.content: I decided to test it on my girlfriend Misty, as I had plenty of pictures of her. She was also my neighbor, so I could just walk over to see if it actually happen. I texted her to see if her parents were around, and she said no. She said I could come over, so I walked across the street to meet up. She greeted me at the door with a kiss, and asked what was up. "So, were you going to color your hair again?" I asked. "Yeah, I finally chose on a color, and just need to buy the dye." She showed me that it was a light pink, so I grabbed a picture of that, and put it into the app for hair color. I pushed the buttton for the change, and waited for the effect. It took a few moments, but I heard her scream from the bathroom. I ran up, and saw she was looking in the mirror, with her new hair color. "How the hell did this happen!?" she said to me. I calmed her down ,and explained what I did. She looked at the app, and couldn't believe it either. "Why the hell did you test it on me?" She asked. "I'm sorry, but I had to test it on someone. Plus you were going to do that anyways." She was still pouting, but I said I would make it up to her. "Well whatever, but now what do we do with it?" She asked. I decided to do a change on myself, since it was only fair. "You pick it too." I told her. She took my phone, and decided what she was going to do.
122.title: My girlfriend

124.content:
I decided to test it on my neighbor first. She was kind of a bitch, so if she got something stolen from her I wouldn't lose sleep over it. Luckily her picture was in the paper, so I got a copy of that, and put her name of Dalia in it. It then gave me a text to type in the transformation. I thought for a second, and I knew what to try out. "That bitch is always talking about how tall she is, so lets she how she feels about being 5 feet tall." I thought to myself, I typed in the change, and submitted it. About minutes later, I hear screaming from my window. I looked out, and saw her running into her backyard. To my shock, she had shrunken. She was screaming at her husband, trying to figure out what happened.

It was real, this could change anybody. I thought for a second, and knew what to do next.
124.title: My neighbor

"No, I want to try something new I found on my phone, and I need your help."

She only lived a block down the road, so I rushed out to get to her house. I knocked on the door, and she greeted me. She was wearing a zipped up hoodie, and sweat pants. Her blonde hair made into a bun.

"Okay, what is this super cool thing you want to show me?" She asked. I showed her the app. "An app? Marky I have seen an app before."She said. "Yes, but what if I told you this app could change your body in any way you want?" I asked her. She gave me a puzzled look. "Look, I can prove it. If you could change one thing about yourself, what would it be?" I asked. She thought for a second, "Well, I wouldn't mind having bigger boobs. Not huge, but maybe a cup or two bigger." She asked. "Not yet, but I do have one thing I want to try."s

You smiled and said "thank you" you went back into the girls restroom and put the pad onto your knickers then carried on with the day...
13112111111131.title: get a tampon or something before it will be str...
